attributes.comment:
Please be aware that the proposed fee increases by USCIS (Docket # USCIS-
2006-0044) will have a deleterious effect on adoption and will reduce the number of
adoptions as it is already a very expensive process. International adoptions are
already expensive and arduous. Please do not add an additional burden on the
backs of prospective adoptive parents. My wife and I are in the process of
adopting from Haiti and we would like to adopt a second child in the near future
but we may need to forego this if costs contiune to rise.
Please be considerate of the needs of both adoptive parents and the unfortunate
children that we are trying to help.

Thank you for your attenmtio in this matter.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Aaron Tussing
